Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-12105 affecting package libsoup for versions less than 3.4.4-11
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-12105 affecting package libsoup for versions less than 3.4.4-11. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package libsoup is earlier than 3.4.4-11, affected by CVE-2025-12105
